turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Please Assistant, I need you to help me place a order of two large gluten-free crust pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would prefer Meat Lovers toppings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want meatlovers for both pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, for the two large pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $50, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will pick it up. Give me an address.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, bella luna's is located on 123 main street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
